Summary: Slow moving bright amber light moving north to southwest that vanished
trends: There have been no other sightings in Chicago Heights
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWent on back porch to get let dogs out and noticed low bright glowing amber light with appearent dome on top approaching from north heading towards me.Called to my brother inside to hurry outside to see object.Both watched as object went overhead on a slight curve to the south west.Ran inside to get my camera phone ,but was to late to capture object as it dissappeared in the distant sky .Object appeared to be glowing and at first thought it to be a meteor until we realized the object was moving as slow as a plane with a prop. and was completely silent as it passed.My brother thought it was a hot air balloon at first because he said it looked like it had a dome on top ,until it passed with the speed of a slow moving plane and no sound.I emmediatly called my sister to tell her and my older brother kept lookingh up saying "that was wierd"
